ftbchunks.zoom_warning: 最大缩放受到内存限制
ftbchunks.appearance.claimed_chunks_on_m: 在地图上显示认领的区块
ftbchunks.appearance.own_claimed_chunks_: 在地图上显示你自己认领的区块
ftbchunks.waypoints.death_waypoints: 在死亡时创建死亡路径点
ftbchunks.waypoints.death_waypoint_autor: 自动删除死亡路径点的距离
如果值大于0，当最近的死亡点与您的距离大于此值，则会自动移除该死亡点
ftbchunks.waypoints.waypoint_fade_distan: 最小路径点光柱淡出距离
ftbchunks.waypoints.waypoint_focus_dista: 玩家十字准星需要离路径点多近才显示名称？
ftbchunks.waypoints.waypoint_focus_scale: 路径点成为焦点时缩放比例是多少？
ftbchunks.advanced.memory.region_release:
释放最近超时（以秒为单位）未被访问的 512x512 区域数据
值越小意味着内存使用量越少，但磁盘访问量会增加，因为要重新加载已释放的区域
设置为0以停用释放区域数据功能。
ftbchunks.advanced.memory.autorelease_on: 关闭地图时自动释放区域

当大地图被关闭时，自动释放区域数据到此项的值。
值越小意味着内存使用量越少，但磁盘访问量会增加，因为要重新加载已释放的区域
设置为0以停用释放区域数据功能。
ftbchunks.advanced.memory.max_zoom_const:
如果为true，最大地图缩小比例受已探索区域数量和可用内存量的限制。
如果觉得不方便，请将其设置为 false。
ftbchunks.minimap.show_player_when_unloc: 未锁定北面时显示玩家
ftbchunks.minimap.font_scale.tooltip: 建议将此值保持在 0.5 的倍数
ftbchunks.minimap.proportional.tooltip:
如果为true，小地图大小与屏幕宽度的 10%% 成比例（可通过缩放比例设置修改）
如果为false，无论屏幕分辨率如何，小地图大小不变
ftbchunks.minimap.text_above_minimap: 在小地图上方显示文本
ftbchunks.gui.mouse_wheel_expiry: 鼠标滚轮：调整强制加载过期时间
ftbchunks.gui.large_map_info.text:
鼠标
左键;点击/拖动移动视图
右键;上下文菜单
鼠标滚轮;滚动以缩放地图

按键
空格;以玩家为视图中心
C;打开区块认领界面
T;传送到鼠标停留的位置（需要OP权限）
S;打开设置界面
Ctrl + S;打开服务器设置界面（需要OP权限）
F3+G;开关区块网格
ftbchunks.gui.chunk_info.text:
认领
左键;拖动框选要认领的区块
右键;拖动取消认领的区块

强制加载
Shift + 左键;拖动框选要强制加载的区块
Shift + 右键;拖动取消强制加载的区块
鼠标滚轮;在已强制加载的区块滚动来设置过期时间

其他
Tab;按住隐藏区块网格
Alt;按住显示的区块认领/强制加载的绝对时间
ftbchunks.gui.admin_mode_info: 启用时可以无视所有权修改区块
ftbchunks.gui.unclaim_all.description: 在地图上取消认领全部可见的已认领区块
ftbchunks.gui.label.name: 名字
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_fake_play:
将所有假玩家视为团队的盟友。
警告：将此项设置为true，可能会导致敌对玩家通过任何假玩家进入你的已认领区块。如果不确定请设为false。
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_named_fak:
将所有假玩家视为团队的盟友。
警告：在此处添加实体，可能会导致敌对玩家通过任何假玩家进入你的已认领区块。如果不确定请留空。
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_fake_play: 允许特定玩家ID的假玩家
允许拥有真实玩家 ID 的假玩家进入您的已认领区块，前提是该玩家是盟友或团队成员。如果不确定请设为true。
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_explosion: 爆炸是否能破坏已认领区块内的方块？
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_pvp.toolt:
是否允许玩家在已认领区块内PVP？
服务端配置选项“允许PVP战斗”必须设为“per_team”此功能才可用
无法保证100%%防范所有间接攻击; 需要攻击源可以判定为来自玩家
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_mob_grief:
是否允许生物破坏已认领区块内的方块？
注：现在只适用于末地人; 可能在未来包括其他生物
如果要防范苦力怕爆炸破坏方块请关闭“允许爆炸破坏方块”功能
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.block_edit_and_: 方块被放置、破坏或被交互时使用
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.block_edit_mode: 方块被放置或破坏时使用
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.block_interact_: 方块被右键时使用，如：开启箱子或拉动拉杆
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.nonliving_entit: 非生物实体（如：画、物品展示框等）被左键点击时使用
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.location_mode.t: 控制哪些玩家可以在地图或小地图上看到你（原版正常追踪范围之外）
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.claim_visibilit: 控制哪些玩家可以在地图或小地图上看到你认领的区块
ftbchunks.fake_players.fake_players.tool:
CHECK: check fake player access like any real player
DENY: never allow fake players
ALLOW: always allow fake players
ftbchunks.claiming.max_claimed_chunks.to: This default can be overridden by the FTB Ranks 'ftbchunks.max_claimed` permission node.
ftbchunks.force_loading.max_force_loaded: This default can be overridden by the FTB Ranks 'ftbchunks.max_force_loaded` permission node.
NEVER: only allow chunk force-loading if the owning team has at least one online player
ALWAYS: always allow force-loading, even if no players are online
DEFAULT: allow force-loading IF the team has at least one player with the FTB Ranks 'ftbchunks.chunk_load_offline' permission
ftbchunks.disable_protection.tooltip: Useful for private servers where everyone is trusted, and claims are only used for force-loading
ftbchunks.pvp_mode: Allow PvP Combat in Claimed Chunks
ftbchunks.pvp_mode.tooltip:
ALWAYS: allow PvP combat in all claimed chunks
NEVER: prevent PvP in all claimed chunks
PER_TEAM: teams can decide if PvP is allowed in their claims via team property
ftbchunks.ally_mode: Allow Player to Change Ally Settings
ftbchunks.ally_mode.tooltip:
DEFAULT: FTB Teams ally status is checked to decide if players are allied
FORCED_ALL: all players are always considered to be allied
FORCED_NONE: no players are ever considered to be allied
ftbchunks.claiming.claim_dimension_black:
Blacklist for dimension ID's where chunks may not be claimed.
E.g. add "minecraft:the_end" to this list if you want to disable chunk claiming in The End
Wildcards are allowed, e.g. "othermod:*" matches all dimensions added by "othermod"
ftbchunks.claiming.claim_dimension_white:
Whitelist for dimension ID's where chunks may be claimed. If non-empty, dimension *must* be in this list (and also not in "Dimension Blacklist".
Same syntax as for "Dimension Blacklist"
ftbchunks.no_wilderness.tooltip: If true, chunks must be claimed before they can be built on
ftbchunks.no_wilderness_dimensions.toolt:
List of dimension ID's where chunks must be claimed before modifying.
E.g. add "minecraft:the_nether" to require chunks to be claimed in the Nether.
Wildcards are allowed, e.g. "othermod:*" matches all dimensions added by "othermod"
ftbchunks.claiming.max_idle_days_before_:
If no team member logs in for this many days, the team's claims will be released.
Setting this to 0 disables auto-unclaiming.
ftbchunks.force_loading.max_idle_days_be:
If no team member logs in for this many days, any force-loaded chunks will no longer be force-loaded.
Setting this to 0 disables auto-unforceloading.
ftbchunks.long_range_tracker_interval.to:
Interval in ticks to send updates to clients with long-range player tracking data.
Lower values mean more frequent updates but more server load and network traffic; be careful with this, especially on busy servers.
Setting this to 0 disables long-range tracking.
ftbchunks.protect_unknown_explosions.too:
Some explosion sources (e.g. Ghasts) can't be determined in code.
If this setting is true, damage from these explosion is prevented in protected chunks.
ftbchunks.claiming.hard_team_claim_limit:
Hard claim limit for party teams, regardless of member count or Party Limit Calculation mode.
Default of 0 means no hard limit.
ftbchunks.force_loading.hard_team_force_:
Hard force-load limit for party teams, regardless of member count or Party Limit Calculation mode.
Default of 0 means no hard limit.
ftbchunks.claiming.party_limit_mode.tool:
Method by which party claim & force-load limits are calculated.
LARGEST: use the limits of the member with the largest limits
SUM: add up all the members' limits
OWNER: use the party owner's limits only
AVERAGE: use the average of all members' limits.
ftbchunks.require_game_stage.tooltip: If true, players must have the 'ftbchunks_mapping' game stage (KubeJS and/or Gamestages required) to be able to open the map or see the minimap
ftbchunks.location_mode_override.tooltip: If true, team "Location Visibility" settings are ignored, and all players can see each other anywhere on the map
ftbchunks.piston_protection.tooltip:
If true, pistons may not push/pull blocks across claims owned by different teams (unless the block is entering/leaving a claim with block edit mode set to Public)
If 'disable_protection' is set to true, this setting is ignored.
ftbchunks.fake_players.max_prevented_log: Fake Player Prevented Access Log Age

Age in days to keep logs of prevented fake player access
Note: not fully implemented feature; will be used in future to display & control access by fake players to your claims
ftbchunks.need_to_claim_chunk: You need to claim this chunk to interact with blocks here!
ftbchunks.action_prevented: Interaction prevented here by claim protection!
ftbchunks.waypoint.shared: Has shared waypoint '%s' with you! Click to add
minimap.info.ftbchunks.biome.title: Biome
minimap.info.ftbchunks.fps.title: FPS
minimap.info.ftbchunks.game_time.title: Game Time
minimap.info.ftbchunks.debug.title: Debug
minimap.info.ftbchunks.player_pos.title: Player Pos
minimap.info.ftbchunks.real_time.title: Real Time
minimap.info.ftbchunks.zone.title: Zone
ftbchunks.commands.no_personal_info: Can't get personal team data for: %s
ftbchunks.command.set_extra_chunks_claim: Set Extra chunks claimed to %d for %s
ftbchunks.command.set_extra_forceload_ch: Set extra force loaded chunks to %d for %s
ftbchunks.command.view_loaded: Chunks Loaded: %d. Check the map to see loaded chunks
